participant_1.background:
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
i am 29 years old.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.

participant_2.background:
I listen to jazz and reminisce about my time in Paris.
I am a creative person who enjoys making jewelry.
I miss my dog, but I'm glad I have Gila.
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.
I could have been a barista, but I'm happy with my life as it is.

content.text: I'm a teacher, and my students are the best people I know.
I'm a creative person who enjoys making jewelry.
What kind of jewelry do you make?
I make earrings, necklaces, and bracelets.
That's awesome! I love jewelry.
Thanks! I'm glad you do.
Do you have a favorite piece of jewelry that you've made?
I do! It's a pair of earrings that I made for my mom.
That's so sweet! What's your favorite thing about being creative?
I love the feeling of making something with my own hands.
I know what you mean. I love cooking for the same reason.
Cooking is so much fun! Do you have a favorite dish to cook?
I love making pasta. It's so easy and delicious.
Pasta is one of my favorite foods! I love it with marinara sauce.
Me too! I also love it with pesto sauce.
Pesto sauce is so good. I love the fresh basil flavor.
Me too! I love basil.
It's one of my favorite herbs.
Me too! It's so versatile.
It is. I love it in pesto sauce, pasta, and salads.
Me too! I also love it in bruschetta and pizza.
Basil is the best!
